answerText: Don Quixote [or Alonso Quijano][10] While in the company of some goatherds, Don Quixote is related the story of this shepherd who died of heartbreak because of being spurned by his love, Marcela. At this man's funeral, Marcela claims that she cannot be held accountable for her own beauty.
heading: VCU Closed |2013 | Michigan B and Yale A | 20 | Literature | European | College
subject: Literature
question: Question: According to the novel that he titles, this character lives "in a place whose name I do not care to remember" in the area of La Mancha. For 10 points each: [10] Name this hopeful knight who rides the horse Rocinante and wanders around the countryside thinking of his love, Dulcinea.
